data.text: @BizzleBeard Aww omg omg that's so cute

@AFrozenSquirrel Both her and Blaze have been fine so far and I think they’re on day 3.
I’m a lot better, thanks. Still incredibly lethargic. I get the occasional headache from it still and have noticed I get a bit out of breath when using the stairs. But nothing too terrible.
@BizzleBeard Oh no! Hopefully she stays symptom free :( How are you doing?
@BizzleBeard Sucks she has it, but glad she's doing ok and that you've at least got someone to spend time with until you're better.
@you_stay_golden I’m getting close now, thank you. And thankfully the two children who have tested positive have not had any rubbish symptoms with it thus far 🤞❤️
@DizzyHellfire I was like “Let’s just do one more episode”, until she couldn’t stay awake any longer 😁

@SourKoolaidShow I’ve felt so sad as I’ve sat in this room from around 10pm each night and the house goes quiet. I’ve really missed being around them while I’ve had covid. So tonight was really nice.
They replenish my heart as well, DP.
@BizzleBeard Hope you all get well soon 💜
@BizzleBeard Bizz this is making me tear up with how wholesome it is.
She’s thankfully not had any symptoms at all and is cruising through it. Hopefully it stays that way.
